title: [PLEASE HELP ME ON THIS] Leaver buster and games crashing
body:
Hey Riot,
Recently I've become more obsessed with Lol than before and weeks before, my game kept crashing and if it crashes it counts as a 'leave' therefore I get leaver buster. 

The crashing happens after the champions are selected and when we get into the game it becomes a black screen with a normal mouse cursor (not the lol finger cursor)
Also crashes in a middle of a game which really sucks because I wanted to continue the game :P.

Now i have a 30 mins leaver buster and I haven't left even one game, they were all crashes and I am really frustrated by it.

Wifi
{{champion:37}}

replies.body:
It sounds like your client is having trouble communicating with your display driver or hardware. Double check that both of them are in good standing by taking a look at the steps in our [FPS guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting)

Let me know if you were able to manage to resolve the issue with those steps.
